name: Equation
author: Alexandre Tavares
description: Adds equation authoring to the editor using KaTeX: toolbar button, equation popover, insertion commands, and KaTeX asset loading.

entries.description: Adds the 'Insert Math (KaTeX)' button to the formatting toolbar; opens the equation popover.
Adds the 'Equation' item to the slash menu and opens the KaTeX popover.
Registers equation-related commands: openEquationPopover and insertEquation.
Declares and eagerly loads KaTeX CSS/JS assets at startup so equations can be rendered.
Listens for clicks on equations to reopen the editing popover.
